text:
Katerina confronts Luzhin, furious.  
“Accuse Sonia of stealing? How dare you!”  

Katerina hugs Sonia tightly.  
“Foolish girl! Give me that money!”  

She snatches the note, crumpling it.  
“Take that, you vile lawyer!”  

---  

Katerina laughs hysterically, eyes wild.  
“Did you ever see such an idiot?”  

“Search her! She’s innocent!”  
“Everyone saw her here with me!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Katerina Ivanovna defends Sonia against accusations of theft, passionately asserting her innocence and confronting Luzhin.
